pullRequest.title: fix(license): Fixed the NullPointerException and addressed code duplication
pullRequest.bodyText:
Signed-off-by: Smruti Prakash Sahoo smruti.sahoo@siemens.com

Please provide a summary of your changes here.

Ref Issue : #962
Issue:
Fixes #962
Suggest Reviewer

You can suggest reviewers here with an @mention.

How To Test?
Try adding obligations in Admin -> Obligations view.
Download license archive from Admin -> Import & Export
Checklist
Must:

 All related issues are referenced in commit messages and in PR
